metadata.title: CVE-2025-23016 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FastCGI fcgi2 (aka fcgi) 2.x through 2.4.4 has an integer overflow (andresultant heap-based buffer overflow) via crafted nameLen or valueLenvalues in data to the IPC socket. This occurs in ReadParams in fcgiapp.c.

criterions.comment: libfcgi package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2025-01-15').
